attributes.action: Save London Refuge for Runaway children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London Refuge for runaway children could be shut down if the goverment no longer helps with funding. Every year thousands of children runaway from abusive homes & have nowhere to go, London Refuge give them a roof over their head, a bed to sleep in, food & so much support. 
If the goverment doesnt step in and ensure the refuge isnt closed down their is no hope for them.
